Liebelei box 13/7 —.— ABENDAUSGABE Neue Züricher Teitund. Zhrich 26.FLS. 1005 — „lnter Mitwirkung von Paula Wessely findet während der diesjährigen Londoner Seasen ein Ensemblegastspiel des Wiener Josefstädter=The#ters statt, das dort Schaws „Heilige Johanna“ Hauptmanns „Rose Bernd" und Schnitzlers „Liebelei" zur Aufführung bringt. — „Die Insel der Ueberraschungen“, das in phantastisch=satyrischer Form das Problem der Rassen¬ vermischung behandelnde neue Stück von Bernard Shaw, gelangt Ende März am Hamburger Thalia¬ Theater zur Uraufführung.

ANT DECISION able- to state, however, that as Dam a result of this meeting a telegram, signed jointly by the entire" Stream¬ line company, is being sent to Mr. Cochran regretfully informing him that, as matters stand at present, they are unable to accept further engage¬ ments with him. Among the artists in“ Streamline“ who were present were Miss Florence Desmond, Miss Nora Howard, Mr. Charles Heslop, and Mr. Esmond Knight, as well as the chorus. I understand that the artists reached their decision with the greatest reluct¬ ance. But the attitude taken up was that, since Mr. Cochran was standing by a principle in which he firmly believed, it was only right that the artists should be equally firm in standing by their own principle. Streamline“ finishes its West End
run to-morrow, and is then going Golders Green and Streatham Hill. Mr. Cochran has announced that his next production will be“ Dalliance, musical version of Schnlttler: * Liebelei.“
